dict.string:
# Note
This workflow has been tested on macOS 15.0. If you are still using macOS 14 please use [version 2.7](https://github.com/Stephen-Lon/Alfred-workflow-open-macos-settings-panes/releases/tag/v2.7) of this workflow.
# Usage
This workflow lists, in response to the user configurable `syset` keyword, various macOS System Preference panes (which are still called `Preference panes` even under macOS 14) to which there is programable access. When you select the relevant pane from the searchable list simply press <kbd>⏎</kbd> to display the pane. Note that you can leave a space after the keyword and type the initial letter(s) of the pane you want in order quickly to jump to that pane.
![Open macOS Settings Panes](Screenshot/Screenshot.png)
From version 2.5 of the workflow Alfred learns from used items to bring them to the top of the list.
# Note
The `Mouse`, `Game Controller` and `VPN` panes will not appear unless and until you have connected to one of those relevant devices.
# Acknowledgment
I am indebted to comments on [this Github post](https://gist.github.com/rmcdongit/f66ff91e0dad78d4d6346a75ded4b751?permalink_comment_id=4258811) for enabling me to find identifiers for various Preference panes.
---
**Version 1.1** 26/10/2022: added two further panes (`General` and `Passwords`) and updated Placeholder Title and Placeholder Subtext in workflow. **Version 1.2** 26/10/2022: updated name of workflow and improved workflow icon. **Version 1.21** 27/10/2022: small correction to Placeholder Title in workflow. **Version 1.3** 02/11/2022: added nine new panes (`About`, `Desktop & Dock`, `Extensions`, `Family`, `Game Centre`, `Game Controllers`, `Mouse`, `Transfer or Reset`, and `VPN`) and icons (with credit to @vitorgalvao). Updates to this configuration file. **Version 1.4** 23/12/2022: add new iCloud pane and added screenshot to User Configuration. **Version 1.5** 05/01/2023: updated bundle identifier. **Version 2.0** 09/03/2024: added a number of anchors to `Accessibility`, `Privacy & Security` and `Sharing` panes. Minor updates to ReadMe. **Version 2.5** 13/03/2024: re-written to use a script filter in order to make use of Alfred 5.5 caching. Alfred now also learns from used items to bring them to the top of the list. Updated ReadMe. `Transfer & Reset` removed as not accessible. Added access to Software Update panel and Keyboard Shortcuts. **Version 2.51** 25/03/2024: removed caching as not required. **Version 2.52** 26/06/2024: added access to `General → AppleCare & Warranty` pane (credit to @FireFingers21). **Version 2.6** 23/08/2024: in response to feature request added access to certain menu bar settings (i.e., search for `menu bar` in workflow will open Control Centre in System Settings). **Version 2.7** 23/08/2024: added access to Keyboard → Function Keys, Keyboard → Modifier Keys, Keyboard → Text Replacements, Privacy & Security → Bluetooth and Privacy & Security → Files and Folders. **Version 3.0** 17/09/2024: updated for compatibility with macOS 15.
The default keyword to run this workflow is "syset". You can change it here.
